BIO

Hi, I'm Vikram S a third year undergraduate, specializing in computer science engineering at SRM Ramapuram , Chennai. I'm a creative person which made me to become a soundful Front End Developer. I'm also pretty good at backends, which combinedly make me a Full Stack Developer. I also make Andriod Application for the peers who are needed of. I love to explore new technologies and always ready to learn something new. I'm open for Internships and Collaborations.

Full Stack Web Developer

I develop responsive web app with front end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, Bootstrap and backend technologies like node.js, express.js, ejs. I too work with live API.

Andriod App Developer

I'm skilled with Kotlin, which is Google's official language for Andriod App Development. I make apps with live APIs and with SQLite database. I also work with Google's Firebase.

UI/UX Designer

I create awesome designs using Photoshop and Adobe XD. With this designing skill, it makes me to create cool front ends for websites.
